page.title: 09TRANSPORT - services
page.content:
Electric passenger trains leave Brockenhurst as follows........ to London 33 trains per day to Manchester 1 train per day to Newcastle 1 train per day to Bournemouth 40 trains per day to Lymington(R) 21 trains per day
The journey by semi-fast train to London is one hour and threequarters. The Hants and Dorset/Wilts and Dorset branch of the National 'Bus Co. run thirteen 'Buses per day in each direction between Southampton and Lymington.
Single deck 'buses run as follows... to Ringwood via Lymington, New Milton and Bransgore on Wednesday. to New Milton via Sway on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays.
